Great for swimming and especially if there are rocks and uneven terrain. They stay snug on your feet while swimming and dry quickly. I wear them on my offshore fishing boat. Very comfortable. Stephen Tindle Apparently we had reached a great height in the atmosphere, for the sky was a dead black, and the stars had ceased to twinkle. By the same illusion which lifts the horizon of the sea to the level . Smight Anna
